primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: God establishes a covenant relationship through acts of deliverance, and the people respond by enthroning Him on their praises, transforming their existence from duty to delight.

tekstueel_bewijs: It is he that hath made us
He remembered for their sake his covenant
God enabled me to be of assistance

object.identificatie: A life of liberated praise and covenant faithfulness
tekstueel_bewijs: The purpose of salvation is that we might give him thanks
The meaning of life is grounded in the praise of God
The Bible teaches that the life of thankfulness is the proper way
The Psalms teach us the purpose and goal of praise

ontvanger.identificatie: The People of God (The flock of His pasture)
tekstueel_bewijs: We thy people, the flock of thy pasture
Save us... that we may give thanks
ontvanger.positie_hoorder: The hearer identifies as the Receiver of God's acts and the Subject of the secondary response.

helper.identificatie: The Psalms / The Holy Spirit (implied through 'enabling')
tekstueel_bewijs: God enabled me to be of assistance
The Psalms present thanksgiving as a call to faith
helper.rol_van_god: God is the primary Subject who also provides the 'enabling' (Helper).
helper.rol_van_geest: Indwelling power that transforms 'have to' into 'want to'.

tegenstander.identificatie: Secularism, Iniquity, and the 'Dogged Sense of Duty'
tekstueel_bewijs: All references to God had been excised
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is not just bad manners, but a 'rebellious' nature and a culture that 'excises' the Creator from the equation.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The believer, moved by gratitude, keeps the commandments and serves the neighbor.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Believer
secundair_narratief_programma.object: Service to neighbor and obedience to commandments
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: Gratitude is the 'cantus firmus' that makes the secondary program of ethics possible. Ethics is the 'proper human response' to the primary program of salvation.

actantieel_schema_visualisatie.subject_naar_object: God → A People for His Praise

voorbeelden_god_subject: He remembered for their sake his covenant
voorbeelden_mens_subject: We thy people... will give thanks
We do not keep them out of a dogged sense of duty
we might keep them with gladness

voorbeelden: I knew I was supposed to do this — it was my duty
became something I wanted to do, not something I had to do
The Psalms teach us the purpose and goal of praise
God enabled me to be of assistance

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon focuses on the transformation of the will (Vouloir) through the gift of grace, moving the subject from Devoir (Law) to Vouloir (Gospel).

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: From the 'Generic' (~S2) to 'Duty' (~S1), then acknowledging 'Iniquity' (S2), finally resolving in 'Gratitude' (S1) through God's 'Remembering' (The Cross/Covenant).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: God's steadfast love (S1) overcomes human rebellion (S2), transforming duty (~S1) into delight.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: High; it acknowledges that people are 'brought low through their iniquity'.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon explicitly subordinates human action to God's prior action. It defines the 'good life' not as human achievement but as a 'redirection' of praise to the Giver.

indicatoren_moralisme.indicator: Potential Exemplarism in the widow story
indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: Her thankfulness created a new situation.

indicatoren_genade.indicator: God as the source of human competence
indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: God enabled me to be of assistance... not our own achievement.
Gratitude is the only proper human response to God’s great work of salvation.

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: The elderly widow is used as a model, but her 'model' behavior is specifically the redirection of credit to God.
bijbelse_figuren_als_model: The people of Israel (as a negative/positive cycle)
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: The sermon already provides this: God is the one who 'relents according to the abundance of his steadfast love'.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Liberation from the 'dread' of duty; joy.
identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Monergistic grace resulting in synergistic living.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The transition from the 'Primary Program' (God saves) to the 'Secondary Program' (Man thanks) is logically and theologically seamless.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: Our praise and thanksgiving is actually envisioned as the throne of God.

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: Endowment: God gives the 'cheerful disposition' and the 'strength to persevere'.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Serious; sin leads to being 'brought low' and requires God to 'remember his covenant' to solve.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is a masterclass in maintaining God as the Subject. Even when discussing human virtues (thankfulness), it identifies God as the Giver of the virtue itself.

modale_balans.voorgestelde_balans: Maintain current balance; it effectively moves the hearer from Devoir to Vouloir.

tegenstander_intensivering.huidige_status: The 'Opponent' in the first half (generic cards) is a bit light.
tegenstander_intensivering.voorgestelde_intensivering: Connect the 'generic' cards more deeply to the 'rebellion' mentioned in Psalm 106.
tegenstander_intensivering.theologische_rationale: To show that forgetting God is not just a social faux pas but a theological catastrophe.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A profound example of how to preach 'Theocentric' ethics without falling into moralism.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: While a rhetorical analysis would focus on the humor of Dr. Johnson, Greimas shows that Johnson is a 'Helper' pointing to the 'Sender' (God).
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis explains the Psalm; semiotics shows how the Psalm's structure (God acts/Man praises) is replicated in the preacher's own life stories.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Reveals that the 'widow' story is not a moral lesson on 'being nice' but a semiotic demonstration of how Gratitude (Object) changes the Subject's competence from 'Duty' to 'Delight'.

appendices.notities: The sermon follows Fleming Rutledge's own 'Grammar of Grace' perfectly.
